title: Ukraine Investigates Deaths by Shelter as Russia Evacuates Border Towns
description: In Ukraine’s capital, residents struggled with the question of who was to blame for a shelter closed off to two women and a child. In Russia, the authorities described evacuations in a border region.

title: U.S. Will Try to Bring China Into Arms Control Talks
description: The nuclear order established during the Cold War is under more stress than at any point since 1962, but efforts to negotiate with Beijing are unlikely to succeed anytime soon.

title: Remains Match Traits of Missing Call Center Workers in Mexico, Officials Say
description: A grisly discovery in western Mexico this week has become a stark reminder of the fate of the country’s tens of thousands of disappeared people.

title: India Train Crash: Up to 50 Feared Dead and Hundreds Injured in Odisha
description: Hundreds more were injured in the crash, which Indian news reports said occurred after at least 10 train cars derailed.

title: Analyzing Shiv’s Decision on ‘Succession’ With a Feminist Text
description: Still grappling with the finale of the hit HBO series? An article by a feminist theorist could be surprisingly helpful with understanding the deals that patriarchal systems offer women.

title: Ukrainian Recruits, Wanting to Fight, Train in the U.K. for Counteroffensive
description: “We’re going to die, probably,” one recruit said bluntly, as he trained on Friday with several hundred others at a military camp in Yorkshire, England.

title: At Least 50 Feared Dead in Train Crash in Indian State of Odisha
description: Hundreds more were injured in the crash, which Indian news reports said occurred after at least 10 train cars derailed.

title: Ukrainian Shelling in Russia’s Belgorod Region Forces  Evacuations
description: ‘The conditions are quite difficult,’ the local governor of the region said on social media.

title: In Finland, NATO’s Newest Member, Blinken Details Russia’s ‘Failures’
description: A speech by the U.S. Secretary of State struck a triumphal tone, while also warning against a rush to short-term solutions to the war in Ukraine.

title: Analyzing Shiv’s Decision on ‘Succession’ With a Feminist Text
description: Still grappling with the finale of the hit HBO series? An article by a feminist theorist could be surprisingly helpful with understanding the deals that patriarchal systems offer women.

title: After Mass Shootings in Serbia, Few Want to Give Up Their Guns
description: Two massacres have prompted the government to tighten already strict rules, but the nation’s gun culture is deep-rooted and complex.

title: Senegal Blocks Some Social Media After Ousmane Sonko Is Sentenced
description: Demonstrators had battled with the police to protest a two-year prison sentence given to a leading opposition figure.

title: The Three Other Trump Investigations
description: The Manhattan case isn’t Trump’s only legal problem.

title: Blinken Finishes Nordic Trip in Finland, NATO’s Newest Member, Focused on Ukraine War
description: A speech by the U.S. Secretary of State celebrated an unexpected degree of Western unity and Ukrainian resolve, but included cautionary notes about what he suggested would be a long and difficult road ahead.

title: Sparrows Are the Main Suspects in a Bird-Nest Murder
description: A nest was assaulted. The main suspect: A nonnative sparrow.

title: Even in Prison, She’s ‘an Indomitable Voice’ for Freedom in Iran
description: Fighting for change has cost Narges Mohammadi her career, separated her from family and deprived her of liberty. But a jail cell has not succeeded in silencing her.

title: As War Persists in Ukraine, Doctors Warn of Rise in Premature Births
description: The mental burden of Russia’s invasion has exacted a heavy toll on civilians. As the fighting drags on, pregnant women are among those facing the toughest trials.

title: Alli Smith, of the Cornell Ornithology Laboratory, offers beginner tips for exploring the wide world of birds.
description: Alli Smith, of the Cornell Lab of Ornithology, offers beginner tips for exploring the wide world of birds.

title: Ukraine Says It Shot Down Dozens of Russian Missiles and Drones
description: The strike, part of a monthlong campaign that has terrorized Kyiv’s residents, comes a day after three people who were unable to gain access to a shelter were killed.

title: Big, Incredible Journeys in an Incredibly Big Country
description: Trips across Australia are often necessarily trips at a striking scale.

title: Your Friday Briefing
description: Ukraine’s and Sweden’s bids to join NATO.

title: Arizona Limits Construction Around Phoenix as Its Water Supply Dwindles
description: In what could be a glimpse of the future as climate change batters the West, officials ruled there’s not enough groundwater for projects already approved.
